author: mattmann
msg: - change name of XMLAssignmentMonitor: in fact, it makes more sense to call this
(AssignmentMonitor), as originally specified by Dave (kudos, Dave!)
- make the Monitor extension point only speak in the vocabulary of the data structs that it
modifies (e.g., rather than use nodeIds, use actual ResourceNode objects)
- add getResourceNodes method to Monitor I/F
- make all Monitor methods throw MonitorException

author: mattmann
msg: - make queueName and loadValue concrete members of Job class: these are things that
are neeeded for each and every job (addtl, they shouldn't be specified by the implementer
of a job, e.g., a job instance that shouldn't be put into the high priority queue is put there)
- add JobInputException, thrown when there is some error with the input to the job

author: woollard
msg: Updates to Scheduler to store Jobs in JobStack when they cannot be scheduled.

author: mattmann
msg: - generic object creation facilities for the resource manager
